[CSIE Speech: Physical & Online] Haven't Signed Up Yet? Level Up Your Taiwan Experience: Legal Hacks & Prof. Kao's Insider Tips!

Hey NDHU Crew!
Feeling like your time in Taiwan is awesome, but maybe a little confusing on the legal side? Don't sweat it! We've got your back with an event designed specifically to help you navigate the legal stuff with confidence.
Why You NEED to Be There (Seriously, This is Epic!)
Level Up Your Taiwan Game: This session is built for international students like you. Gain the legal knowledge you need to feel secure and empowered during your stay.
Meet the Legal Expert: Prof. Dr. Bernard Y. Kao! He is a legal specialist and international academic/cultural exchange promoter (check out the international master's program he founded here: What is TRIM? https://shorturl.at/OmzNU) and he's dropping all his insider knowledge on legal essentials in Taiwan. Don't miss this chance to learn from the best!

Here's the Lowdown on What You'll Get:
Legal Hacks 101: Demystify key legal concepts that affect your daily life in Taiwan.
Confidence Boost: Feel empowered to navigate legal situations with ease and peace of mind.
Ask Away! Prof. Kao is here to answer all your burning questions and address any legal concerns you might have.
This is your chance to unlock the secrets to a smoother, more confident experience in Taiwan. Don't miss out! And we'd encourage you to attend the physical event in person if you are around the campus to show our hospitality to the speaker, as he is so kind and willing to come all the way from Taichung to give you this speech.
Date and Time: Thursday, July 18th, from 13:30 to 15:30
Venue: Room C303, Science & Engineering Building II, NDHU
Online Participation: Available through Google Meet: https://meet.google.com/zub-hugb-pps
Physical and Online Registration Links: Physical Speech Registration: https://reurl.cc/xanmve | Online Speech Registration: https://reurl.cc/4rZzL3 (Required for Distributing Cross-Domain Hours)
Feel free to reach out if any questions or concerns, and look forward to seeing you there! ğŸ˜ƒ
